page.title: 08HOTEL INTERVIEW(cont.)
page.content: has changed very little. From Mon. to Thurs. he is always fully booked.To work at this hotel,a 1 year college course is required.Students from the college come for work experience at the hotel.The best thing about being manager of a hotel is the organisation and variety.The worst thing is as you get older you think about the long hours and retiring. As it is 3-star hotel it has to have a lounge and limited room service. Apart from the occasional pool tournament,the hotel has no sports facilities.The only modern equipment is a small computer to help with finance. Mr. Eric is a man who loves his job but is thinking of retiring,and is beginning to regret being single because his job will not last forever. Mr. Eric seems to be happy and the hotel happy with him.
